sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="webclick">给后台发送消息</button>
</template>

<script setup>
import axios from "@/plugins/axios"

const webclick = () => {
  const url = '/haha'
  const config = {params: {}}
  axios.get(url,config)
      .then(response => {
        console.log(response)
      })
}
</script>
